# Baselyne Systems

> AI infrastructure, data engineering, and MLOps consulting. We help teams move AI from experimentation into production.

## About

Baselyne Systems is a founder-led consulting firm focused on AI infrastructure, data engineering, and MLOps. We bring large-scale engineering experience from Meta and Alphabet to companies building production AI systems.

## Services

### Data Infrastructure
Modern data platforms for AI workloads: lakehouse architecture, real-time and batch pipelines, data governance, semantic data layers, and vector search infrastructure for RAG.
URL: https://baselynesystems.com/services/data-infrastructure-consulting

### MLOps
Get AI from prototype to production: model and prompt versioning, deployment infrastructure, evaluation and monitoring, ML pipeline orchestration, and continuous improvement workflows.
URL: https://baselynesystems.com/services/mlops-consulting

### AI Infrastructure
Scalable AI compute with cost control: GPU orchestration, cost attribution, LLM serving infrastructure, security and compliance, and AI observability.
URL: https://baselynesystems.com/services/ai-infrastructure-consulting

## Founder

Achyuth Samudrala - Nearly a decade of infrastructure engineering experience, including six years at Meta and Alphabet. Built petabyte-scale data platforms and systems handling 100M+ queries per second.
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/achyuthsamudrala/

Schedule a 30-minute call to discuss your infrastructure challenges.
